remarks: The variables in a polynomial algebra are contained in every subring algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2015.)
statement:
subrgvr1.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` R ) $.
subrgvr1.r $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
subrgvr1.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
subrgvr1cl.u $e |- U = ( Poly1 ` H ) $.
subrgvr1cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
subrgvr1cl $p |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
